metadata.title: CVE-2023-46749 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Shiro before 1.13.0 or 2.0.0-alpha-4, may be susceptible to a pathtraversal attack that results in an authentication bypass when usedtogether with path rewriting Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.13.0+ or2.0.0-alpha-4+, or ensure `blockSemicolon` is enabled (this is thedefault).

criterions.comment: shiro: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
